TextLibrary.Text: I did not believe a Human could fight in such a manner. I bow to your skill.
I did not believe a Human could fight in such a manner. I bow to your skill.
I did not believe a Human could fight in such a manner. I bow to your skill.
I did not believe a Human could fight in such a manner. I bow to your skill.
You're a good teacher, Red-Axe. I've learned much from you.
You're a good teacher, Red-Axe. I've learned much from you.
You're a good teacher, Red-Axe. I've learned much from you.
You're a good teacher, Red-Axe. I've learned much from you.
There is nothing more that I can teach you. I give you my Axe and name you the newest Master of the Axe.
There is nothing more that I can teach you. I give you my Axe and name you the newest Master of the Axe.
There is nothing more that I can teach you. I give you my Axe and name you the newest Master of the Axe.
There is nothing more that I can teach you. I give you my Axe and name you the newest Master of the Axe.
Thank you, Red-Axe. I'll give your regards to Tauron.
Thank you, Red-Axe. I'll give your regards to Tauron.
